product_name: Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket offers warmth and stretch for climbing excursions, ski trips or other cold-weather adventures where mobility is key. Front panels contain Thermal R(TM) synthetic insulation that offers warmth, low bulk, excellent packability and continues to insulate even if wet. Ripstop-nylon shell fabric over the insulated panels features a durable water repellent finish to bead up water so it rolls off. Hood, sides, arms and back are made of soft Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) for breathable mobility and warmth. Full-length front zipper; soft collar lining and chin guard. Lightweight stretch binding at cuffs and bottom hem; thumbholes hold sleeves in place over hands. The men's Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket has zippered hand pockets. Athletic, close-fitting cut aids warmth without inhibiting movement. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket offers warmth and stretch for climbing excursions, ski trips or other cold-weather adventures where mobility is key.
